name: Uta
text: On Play: Set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, you cannot play Character cards with a base cost of 5 or more during this turn. On K.O.: Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand as rested.

effect.text: Set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, you cannot play Character cards with a base cost of 5 or more during this turn.
Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand as rested.
